title: Failing test: Should have managed to find at least the core extractor extractor

labels.name: fix-implemented
labels.description: A fix is available, but has not been merged or released, yet.

body:
#### What is the problem?
First ran it within datalad-crawler installation, so thought it is specific to it, but seems to be generic (I am using virtualenv if that is relevant):
```shell
(git)hopa:~datalad/datalad-master[master]git
$> python -m nose -s -v datalad.metadata.extractors.tests.test_base      
datalad.metadata.extractors.tests.test_base.test_api_git(True,) ... FAIL
datalad.metadata.extractors.tests.test_base.test_api_annex(False,) ... FAIL
Versions: appdirs=1.4.3 boto=2.44.0 cmd:annex=6.20180510+gitg500f7ea78-1~ndall+1 cmd:git=2.11.0 cmd:system-git=2.17.0 cmd:system-ssh=7.6p1 exifread=2.1.2 git=2.1.8 gitdb=2.0.3 humanize=0.5.1 iso8601=0.1.11 msgpack=0.5.1 mutagen=1.40.0 requests=2.18.4 scrapy=1.5.0 six=1.11.0 tqdm=4.19.5 wrapt=1.9.0

======================================================================
FAIL: datalad.metadata.extractors.tests.test_base.test_api_git(True,)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nose/case.py", line 197, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad-master/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 493, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (d,)), **kw)
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad-master/datalad/metadata/extractors/tests/test_base.py", line 51, in check_api
    "Should have managed to find at least the core extractor extractor"
AssertionError: Should have managed to find at least the core extractor extractor
-------------------- >> begin captured logging << --------------------
datalad.utils: Level 5: Importing datalad.utils
datalad.utils: Level 5: Done importing datalad.utils
datalad.cmd: Level 9: Will use git under '/usr/lib/git-annex.linux' (no adjustments to PATH if empty string)
datalad.cmd: Level 9: Running: ['git', 'version']
datalad.cmd: Level 8: Finished running ['git', 'version'] with status 0
datalad.cmd: Level 9: Running: ['git', 'config', '-z', '-l', '--show-origin']
datalad.cmd: Level 8: Finished running ['git', 'config', '-z', '-l', '--show-origin'] with status 0
datalad.ui: Level 5: Starting importing ui
datalad.ui.dialog: Level 5: Starting importing ui.dialog
datalad.ui.dialog: Level 5: Done importing ui.dialog
datalad.ui: Level 5: Initiating UI switcher
datalad.ui: DEBUG: UI set to DialogUI(out=<file>)
datalad.ui: Level 5: Done importing ui
--------------------- >> end captured logging << ---------------------

======================================================================
FAIL: datalad.metadata.extractors.tests.test_base.test_api_annex(False,)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nose/case.py", line 197, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad-master/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 493, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (d,)), **kw)
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad-master/datalad/metadata/extractors/tests/test_base.py", line 51, in check_api
    "Should have managed to find at least the core extractor extractor"
AssertionError: Should have managed to find at least the core extractor extractor

----------------------------------------------------------------------
Ran 2 tests in 2.525s

FAILED (failures=2)
(dev) 1 21082 ->1.....................................:Mon 14 May 2018 01:40:11 PM EDT:.
(git)hopa:~datalad/datalad-master[master]git
$> which python                                                    
/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad-master/venvs/dev/bin/python
changes on filesystem:                                                                                                                
 .asv                             |  0
 datalad/distribution/siblings.py | 18 +++++++++++++-----
(dev) 1 21083.....................................:Mon 14 May 2018 01:41:45 PM EDT:.
(git)hopa:~datalad/datalad-master[master]git
$> git describe
0.10.0.rc3-23-gf68bd239

```

note the double "extractor" in the message which might get fixed along
